conditions.solvent: mixed solution of DMF and 1.25 M hydrochloric acid (HCl) (1:1, v:v)
conditions.washing_method: washed with DMF and deionized water alternately for three times
conditions.drying_method: immersed in fresh acetone to exchange DMF and water from pores

synthesis_conditions.solvents: mixed solution of DMF and 1.25 M hydrochloric acid (HCl) (1:1, v:v)
synthesis_conditions.washing_method: washed with DMF and deionized water alternately for three times
synthesis_conditions.drying_method: immersed in fresh acetone to exchange DMF and water from pores
